name: Pressure Point Training
description:
You are trained in special pressure point techniques. You may use an action to make a pressure point attack, rolling Dexterity vs Defense against an adjacent foe. If you win the roll, choose one:

  • They check a condition.

  • Their speed is reduced by 5 ft.

  • They take -1d to all rolls under BODY until the end of their next turn.

  • They cannot use reactions until the start of their next turn.

You may make multiple pressure point attacks each turn. The effects are cumulative.

improvements.name: Catch Them Off-Guard
improvements.description: When defending in an engagement, you may spend engagement successes to make pressure point attacks (you still must make the opposed roll).

improvements.name: Five Touch Attack
improvements.description: If you successfully make five pressure point attacks against a foe in one round, they roll injury and their speed is reduced to zero until the end of their next turn.
